changeSet.author: mstead
changeSet.comment: Cleanup all ueber data so that the new style ueber certs can be used.
changeSet.sql: delete from cp_ent_certificate where entitlement_id in ( select e.id from cp_entitlement e inner join cp_pool p on e.pool_id = p.id inner join cp2_products prod ON prod.uuid = p.product_uuid where prod.name like '%_ueber_product' );

delete from cp2_owner_content where content_uuid in ( select c.uuid from cp2_content c inner join cp2_product_content pc on pc.content_uuid=c.uuid inner join cp2_products p on p.uuid=pc.product_uuid where p.name LIKE '%ueber_product' );

delete from cp2_content where uuid in ( select c.uuid from cp2_content c inner join cp2_product_content pc on pc.content_uuid=c.uuid inner join cp2_products p on p.uuid=pc.product_uuid where p.name LIKE '%ueber_product' );
delete from cp2_products where name like '%_ueber_product';
delete from cp_consumer where name like 'ueber_cert_consumer';

changeSet.author: mstead
changeSet.comment: Delete the UeberConsumer consumer type as it is no longer used.
changeSet.sql: delete from cp_consumer_type where label='uebercert';
